SummaryEnglish: Life in a small city needn't be boring. Not when your city is home to a host of deeply odd people. Granted some residents, like high-school buddies Mio and Yuko, are fairly normal. Yuko is a world-class space-case and Mio has an unusual mastery of wrestling and boxing, but... okay, so they're odd too. Together with fellow residents such as Nano, the frequently modified robot of five-year-old genius the Professor, talking cat Sakamoto (that's Sakamoto-san to you!), and their own friend, the poker-faced lunatic Mai, they lead provincial lives that are perfectly mundane and thoroughly bizarre.

1.SummaryEnglish: Mio Naganohara tries to comfort her friend Yuko Aioi when she gets a 1% score on a test. Meanwhile, robotic girl Nano Shinonome tries to give the small 'Professor', who has a cold, some medicine, which she refuses to eat, and tries to get advice from their talking cat, Sakamoto. Finally 'professor' eat the medicine that Shinonome mixed the medicine with pudding called Crunchy pudding. Later, Yuko, Mio and their friend Mai Minakami go on a train ride, which is completely empty at this time of the day.

2.SummaryEnglish: Promotional spot that shows a store while the girls are confused about where it is.

1.SummaryEnglish: Selamat pagi! Goats? What's wrong with goats? What does KY mean? I don't have any special features, but my toe comes off.

2.SummaryEnglish: The incantation of resurrection. A shark. A warrior never goes back on her word! My life is over!

3.SummaryEnglish: I'm sorry I didn't eat your black beans! I won't crumble under such threats! In human terms, I'm 20 years old. Earth Dangerous!

4.SummaryEnglish: It doesn't grow from the sides! It's a snowman. And who would give gum to a cat, you fool? Super ultra great delicious wonderful...

5.SummaryEnglish: Why do magnets attract each other? God is dead! The baby is coming! I'm going to draw an awesome man!

6.SummaryEnglish: I accept her challenge. What is the principal doing to that deer? Death or die! Mio-chan, stop! You'll kill yourself!

7.SummaryEnglish: This is simply our just God's punishment, Albert. Are you dating anyone right now? If I don't pawn this scythe and buy some food, I'll die. If you get this question right, you'll receive an arm!

8.SummaryEnglish: I've got an explosive desire to visit an air-raid shelter! Everything you own is garbage! Just let me take it off when I'm ready. He made a snot bubble. A masterpiece.

9.SummaryEnglish: I'm dreaming. I must be dreaming... They may maintain their flavor, but they're not maintaining their spirit! No matter how many I kill, they never learn their lesson. My lower half is unprotected!

10.SummaryEnglish: Someone put in stained glass! Don't expect us to have infinite water! Did you know mature people don't eat snacks? When I grow up, I want to be a frill-necked lizard.

11.SummaryEnglish: Pretending to be asleep won't do any good! Super ultra great delicious wonderful bad. That must be the power of Daiku Industries. Surely happiness must taste like mud.

12.SummaryEnglish: It's hot... It's so hot! I'm just hoping aliens invade... 5,000,000 yen per shot.The sleeping princess woke, without a kiss.

13.SummaryEnglish: The kid is up to something ridiculous again. Your trick is out in the open! Buy it! Buy it! Buy it! Buy it! Starting tomorrow, you can go to school.

14.SummaryEnglish: Nano goes to school, the Go-Soccer Club learns the rules, while Mio and Yukko yell compliments at each other.

15.SummaryEnglish: Everybody's out to prove that Nano's really a robot — especially the science teacher. The Professor gives Nano a machine gun arm and a new "Reaction function." Meanwhile, Mr. Takasaki sets his sights on the student advisor, Ms. Sakurai.

16.SummaryEnglish: Yukko can't order a cup of coffee, Mio has to fight to keep her secret. And Nano gets a suprise visit at home.

17.SummaryEnglish: Sakamoto loses his scarf to a very polite crow, three people are buried alive, and Yukko is determined to no longer call out Mai's jokes.

18.SummaryEnglish: Yukko is on her way meet Mai in a neighboring town, where Mai supposedly has a way to get free candy, but on her trip she constantly makes a fool of herself and gains a stalker. The professor creates Biscuit #2, but he isn't that impressive. And the servants of Starla are playing a very deadly game.

19.SummaryEnglish: Yukko tries her best to teach Mio. Sakamoto and the Professor have a fight. And we witness a high level, no holds barred game of Go-Soccer.

20.SummaryEnglish: Mio has enlisted her friends to help her finish her manga. The material proves to be to risqué for Nano, Yukko doesn’t want to screw up, and Mai is bored.

21.SummaryEnglish: Misato, Weboshi, and Fe-chan talk about their current love interest. Mr. Takashi runs into Ms. Sakurai; is this a date!? The soldiers can’t find the last wooden cube, but a new challenger appears.

22.SummaryEnglish: Tsuyoshi attempts to disprove exorcisms. Fe-chan tries to look on the bright side of life, while Sakamoto and the Professor are surrounded by terrifying dogs.

23.SummaryEnglish: Mio is poisoned, Makoto is caught, Yukko makes a tough decision, and Mai tries to make peace with the Professor.

24.SummaryEnglish: Yukko has big news! Mihoshi and Misato share a sister moment. And who does Nano love more?

25.SummaryEnglish: Misato and Sasahara get a little closer, Mio goes for a run, and Nakamura enters the lair of the beast.

26.SummaryEnglish: Let's have a birthday party for Nano! Professor, what do you mean, "a little one?" Got it! I'll take this ugly one away, too! Cake, cake, cake!
